import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' function Shop({match}) { const product=products.find((p)=> p._id == match.params.id) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: €{product.price} Description {product.description} Price; €{product.price}
) } export default Shop
